page.title: 17FARMING AROUND ABERAERON
page.content: {Pengarreg Farm}is a 90 acre council farm and it's buildings are almost in Aberaeron. The owner is{George Lloyd. The farm is some distance from the farmhouse and is on steep plateau land. The soil is not good{class B and {C - too acid for grade A. The farmer has worked the farm for 35 years and longlet it 20 years ago. His son Huw and local children help him to work the farm. Hay was usually grown but they are starting silage this year with new building in FFos-y-Ffin. A new estate will be built on the site of older buildings.He has 40 beef + 28 heifers.60 sheep and 72 lambs were kept for the first time this year. Used to milk 110-120 gallons a day in Summer and 40-50 gallons in Winter. Now he only keeps beef because of EEC quotas.Mr LLoyd hopes to do more fishing and playing bowls on retiring.
